file_insights.changes_summary: Added keyboard event handling for Enter and Space key selection in dropdown menu
key_modifications: Added event handling for 'Enter' and 'Space' keys
Implemented item selection logic based on focused index

patterns_discovered: Accessible keyboard navigation for dropdown menus
Conditional item selection based on disabled state
gotchas_discovered: Need to prevent default event behavior
Check for disabled state before allowing selection
Ensure focused item reference exists before triggering click

approach_outcome.description: Added Enter and Space key handlers for item selection

recommendations: Add aria attributes for improved accessibility
Consider adding keyboard navigation hint for users
Implement consistent keyboard interaction across all dropdown components
